activities: Blue State Digital handles Personal Data transferred from the European Economic Area (EEA) in accordance with the U.S.- E.U. Safe Harbor Principles (collectively, the "Principles"). Some of this data is collected via Sites using Blue State Digital software and some of it is received by Blue State Digital as a result of its provision of services to its Clients. When acting as an agent processing Personal Data under the direction of its Clients, Blue State Digital enters into agreements with its Clients specifying the conditions under which Personal Data received from the EEA can be processed and kept secure.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: BBB EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program
